DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Partial Thromboplastin Time Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to partial thromboplastin time performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Partial Thromboplastin Time Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._This is a measurement of the intrinsic pathway of coagulation. Significant deficiency in factors II, V, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII or anticoagulants will prolong PTT.Performed; carried out._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: This is a measurement of the intrinsic pathway of coagulation. Significant deficiency in factors II, V, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII or anticoagulants will prolong PTT.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A measurement of the length of time that it takes for clotting to occur when activating reagents are added to a plasma specimen. The test is partial due to the absence of tissue factor (Factor III) from the reaction mixture.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the partial thromboplastin
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the partial thromboplastin time (PTT) less than or equal to 1.5 X ULN?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) <= 1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is receiving anticoagulant therapy in which case the aPTT must be within the therapeutic range of intended use for the anticoagulant

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) <=1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is receiving anticoagulant therapy, in which case the aPTT must be within the therapeutic range of intended use for the anticoagulant

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is this patient's Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) less than or equal to 1.5 x institutional ULN?

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013
